import React from 'react' import './game-info.css' function GameInfo({gameTitle}) { const showColor = (e) =>{ console.log(e.target.id); switch(e.target.value){ case 1: document.getElementById(1).classList.add('game__star--gold') case 2: document.getElementById(2).classList.add('game__star--gold') case 3: document.getElementById(3).classList.add('game__star--gold') case 4: document.getElementById(4).classList.add('game__star--gold') case 5: document.getElementById(5).classList.add('game__star--gold') } } return (

{gameTitle + ' Game'}
